Name: Flykt
About the game: Flykt is a 4 player online co-op escape horror game. Players will try to escape from an abandoned hospital which lives three creatures in it. These creatures can sense any kind of noise. Players will require to be silent and move in stealth. Each sound will attract the creatures. There are some items which helps players to survive longer. Also one of the players play as impostor and help creatures to kill all his friends to get a ticket to leave the place. Features 4 player co-op Procedural generated dungeons Advanced field of view and enemy detection system for creatures Noise investigation Item system for players to survive longer Allow players to work with creatures as impostors
